title: Penguin: We wanted to get it out before Easter
post:
Frankly, I think the author’s principal premise has as much reality as “da Vinci photo shopped” it. Yet he authors of that disputable premise  begin by destroying the Shroud is a “painted”  fake premise. I await the Cambridge Shroud explanation. It will be necessary to sift the facts from the theory reported and see what of value is there.
However, don’t sneeze at the fact that a major publisher is giving a “Shroud is real” book real exposure. The door to renewed public understanding may be opening.
author: John Klotz
